value:
Even in an unfamiliar world, I must
keep learning. An emperor can never
stop moving forward.

Fódlan is united, but my work is not
yet finished. There are still those who
slither in the dark to deal with.

There are many rulers among your
company. Commanding them must
weigh on you... You should rest.

Would you share your opinions on
the other Heroes with me? I imagine
yours is a more objective position.

I was just designing a new form of
government in my mind. One that
might make for a better world.$k$pThere is much I have yet
to consider...

I was asked to extend a greeting on
behalf of $Nf.
Now I have.
I must outwit even death.

My reach cannot lag behind
my ambitions!
It's not enough!
With this power, I will cut my own path!

I am Edelgard, uniting emperor of all
Fódlan. Whatever you seek, you may
trust I have the reach to deliver it.

Do not misunderstand, but... I want
you. Your wisdom, your ability... But
more than any of that, your heart.$k$pThe Adrestian empire united Fódlan.
But that struggle was only the start.
I have much work left to do.$k$pThere are many ready to come to
my aid, but none like you. You are
something special.$k$pSo, stay alive, and I will remain here
until this world's strife is no more.$k$pAnd when that time comes, I expect
you will return with me to Fódlan.
Reach for my hand. Promise me.
たああっ！
覚悟して！
かはあっ
まだよっ！
A victory for the future!
You can't stop me.
No mercy.
This battle is your last.
You must lead the others...
Hm?
The title of Emperor falls to House Hresvelg. However, that legacy ends with me.
Only you are brave enough to surpise the Adrestian Emperor.
Ancient practices, left unchecked, will rot the world.
I will create a world where all people are free, regardless of their bloodline...
Could you trust someone, even knowing they may betray you?
I have no regrets. But I sometimes wonder if things might have been different...
You will become the light that shines over this world...
Understood.
Your plan?
Time to go.
